email.title: Weekly Digest

image.title: Motion to stop biscuit images? Seriously, coming up with unique biscuits is actually quite hard, finding a good picture is even harder. Why not some sweet treats?

email.text:
Another week, another digest!<sup><sup><sup>Yeah it's Wednesday..</sup></sup></sup>
Check out our DoCSoc Education volunteering initiative below to teach Python to life sciences students. It's a great way to get experience in teaching students!
If you managed to get a ticket, also look forward to participating in IC Hack 18, the largest student-run hackathon in the UK, this weekend. It's bound to be a blast! If you suddenly can't make it, please cancel your ticket on Eventbrite so that someone else currently on the waitlist can attend in your place.
Without further ado...
email.heading: Volunteers Needed for DoCSoc Education
email.text:
*As you may have heard, we're starting a new initiative called DoCSoc Education aiming to teach students from other courses to code.*
Our first venture will be [teaching Python to students from life sciences courses](https://www.facebook.com/events/333505960463269/), and we could definitely use some volunteers to help. You don't have to be amazing at Python - if you're interested in helping, let us know by either sending us an email (docsoc@imperial.ac.uk), or PMing us on [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/ICDocSoc/).
email.heading: Accenture Powerful Minds Competition
email.sponsor:
Discovering an insight into the way your mind works can be interesting. Food to boost your brain can also be tasty. And a little competition can be fun? We've combined all of these together to bring you a brand new initiative beginning in January.
## What's in it for you? - Chance to win cash prizes towards your society/club. First prize a massive £1,000! Second £250 and third £100. - Each society/club that signs up will also receive an assortment of delicious breakfast bars for your members to enjoy! *(editor's note: we'll figure out how to distribute these later)* - Individual weekly spot prizes: Accenture branded hoodies to keep you warm and Clifton StrengthsFinder assessment codes to help you discover more about yourself with an in-depth report of your strengths.
If you would like to participate, use [this link](https://ad.doubleclick.net/ddm/clk/411273196;211960615;a).
email.sign:
That's all for now!
Until next time,
